multisource data collection.reasoning: Multisource data collection refers to the method of gathering data from multiple sources, in this case from employee-manager dyads, which provides a comprehensive view of the relationship being studied.
passages: Using multisource data from 209 employee-manager dyads in South Korea

mediating effect analysis.reasoning: Mediating effect analysis is a specific analytical approach used to explore the indirect effects of leader behavioral integrity on employee in-role performance through coworker support, indicating a methodological process in the research.
passages: this paper found support for the mediating effect of coworker support in the positive relationship between leader behavior integrity and employees' in-role autonomy
